roomTypeId.description: The ID of the room type this availability applies to

date.description: The specific date for this availability entry (YYYY-MM-DD)

availableQuantity.description: The number of rooms of this type available for booking on this date

priceModifier.description: A multiplier or additive amount that adjusts the room type's base price for this date (e.g., 1.2 for +20%, 0.8 for -20%)

minStayNights.description: Minimum nights required for a booking starting on this date for this room type

maxStayNights.description: Maximum nights allowed for a booking starting on this date for this room type

blockedReason.description: Reason if the entire room type is blocked for this date
